data.name: Force Field Lab
data.description: Military grade active shielding to protect ionized particles from solar wind using superconducting magnets forming a Langevin field.
data.rawText: Bernal 10 MASS 10 Rad-Hard S HOME: Gain the Powersat refuel priv. Military grade active shielding Force Field Lab

data.name: L2 Force Field Bernal
data.description: Intended for protection against low-energy ions on either side of the solar wind behind charged plasma windows.
data.rawText: Bernal 10 MASS 10 Rad-Hard S HOME: Gain the Powersat refuel priv. L2 Force Field Bernal

data.name: Catcher's Mitt Lab
data.description: CATCHER'S MITT - High per-word cost to repurpose orbital node for chemical or rail launch from LEO to cislunar sites.
data.rawText: Bernal 10 MASS 6 Rad-Hard E HOME: Gain the Powersat refuel priv. Catcher's Mitt Lab

data.name: Catcher's Mitt Bernal
data.description: CATCHER'S MITT - Clean Space One concept for orbital debris removal and recycling. Mass: 420 tonnes, Length: 40m, Inhabitants: 4
data.rawText: Bernal 10 MASS 6 Rad-Hard E HOME: Gain the Powersat refuel priv. Catcher's Mitt Bernal
